Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionsProvider
    This class represent a generic action provider, it is then extended into more specific providers, like Match and Turn
    Ammo
    This class represent a set of ammo, it contains all three AmmoColors (Blue, Red, Yellow) and all operations and evaluation that are needed to be done
    AmmoDeck
    This class represent the deck that contains all AmmoCards not currently in play
    AmmoSquare
    This class represents a square that contains an AmmoCard that can be grabbed
    Bot  
    GameBoard
    This class is the board of the game, it contains all the squares, the kill shot track and all the methods to calculate the required squares for actions
    Match
    This class represent he entire Match, it contains all the references to the Players, the GameBoard, the current Turn and the possible Actions.
    Player
    This class represent a single playing Player, it contains all infos available to the player
    PowerUpDeck
    This class represent the deck that contains all PowerUpCards not currently in play
    PowerUpSet
    This class represent the PowerUpCards a Player have, every Player can have at most 3 PowerUpCard, the PowerUpCards are divided in three groups: EndStart, InTurn, CounterAttack.
    SpawnAndShopSquare
    This class represent one of the Squares where a player can spawn and buy WeaponCards, it contains the WeaponCards the selectionBox of the corresponding color contains
    Square
    This class describes a generic Square, it must be specialized in either a SpawnAndShopSquare or a AmmoSquare
    Turn
    This class represent a single turn of the Match, it manage the actions a Player can do through the BranchMaps
    WeaponDeck
    This class represent the deck that contains all WeaponCards not currently in play
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AmmoColor
    This class contains the colors WeaponCards, PowerUpCards and Squares can assume
    PlayerColor
    This class contains the colors Players can assume
    SquareBorder
    This class contains the border types that can be found between squares
